newsitem.title: LEBANON: SOLIDERE A shares up on Beirut Stock Exchange.
newsitem.headline: SOLIDERE A shares up on Beirut Stock Exchange.

text.p: SOLIDERE A shares were up while B shares were steady in slightly increased turnover on Tuesday on the Beirut Stock exchange.
A shares rose, 1.8 percent, to $112 from Monday's $110 and B shares were steady on $115.125.
Turnover rose slightly to 7,829 shares from 7,700 on Monday, and value was $881,833.75 from $860,575.
There was no trade in the four other listed companies: Ciments Libanais, Ciments Blancs, Eternit and Uniceramic. None the shares of the four companies were traded last week.
The LISPI stock index rose 0.26 percent to 84.10 and the BLOM stock index rose 0.69 percent to 969.03.
